name: Hammerhead High
description:
I created Hammerhead High for a 24-hour game jam put on my USC's Makers of Entertaining Games Association. The purpose of the jam was to promote positivity and diversity in the games industry. I made Hammerhead High because I wanted to make people laugh, and I also wanted to draw adorable sharks. I liked Hatoful Boyfriend and Tsundere Shark Reddit so why not.

I'd like to make a full-length version of Hammerhead High one day.

Hammerhead High was build in the Ren'py visual novel engine. I would highly recommend this engine to anyone interested in creating interactive fiction.

Additional Credits:
Cover art by Jocelyn Kim
Background art by Cameron Koller
